column4: how do I get a list of installed packages from the command line?
any way of sorting between default packages and ones I installed on my own?
dpkg -l | grep ^ii
dpkg -l shows what you have installed or was installed
and erm .no
'default' ?
I'm thinking of restarting a Dapper install from scratch, but then want to install all the packages I had installed before
my current Dapper upgrade has serious issues
such as?
i mean what kind of issues
I updated from Breezy to Dapper and some programs that use sound freeze the machine.
which ones ?
for example I run fceu (which I compiled from source) and it says "couldn't get sound resource" or something and just freezes
hmm ok well
best thing you could do is run dpkg -l  > mypackagelist.log
save it somewhere save
reinstall
then diff?
and read back into the list
good idea
